name: Taco (Trikyname, Mork978)
description:
Developed by nombre[team]

A humorous and fantastical 3D Shoot'Em Up were you can steal your opponent bullets and use them to your advantage.

Sinopsis

You wake up on an island with only one thought in your mind... TACOS!

Following a trail (and some signs, conveniently placed) you find yourself in front of "THE GOLDEN TACO", the most beautiful and juiciest Taco anyone has ever seen. 

But ..wait a minute... is that a gorilla?  Oh sh*t, that's an actual f**king gorilla! What the f**k!?

How can a gorilla open up a rift in reality!? What is going on!?

Mechanics

A spin in traditional 3D top down shoot'em up. In order to defeat the giant Gorilla, our hero... frog... whatever he is, has to use its long tongue to catch the enemy's projectiles and use them against the gorilla. He can swallow the projectiles to recover health and gain energy or throw it back with increased power.

Better experience with a controller.

XBox Controller Bindings

ADashBCatch (No Hold Projectile)
Release (Holding Projectile)
XConsumeYHealRT/LTBlankLBMelee AttackRBDashLeft JoystickMovementRight JoystickDirection/ Shooting Projectile
